list.name: Worker Reschedule

options.content:
* You can select multiple Jobs, list of Workers will be filtered based on that, only one of the jobs is selected by default
* You can select multiple Workers, All are selected by default
* Stats in all panels will be based on selected Jobs and Workers
* check per worker stats below when there are large variance in cluster level stats, or when you want to spot outlier workers

panels.description: Avg of utilization across all selected workers and instances

targets.expr:
avg (
  (1 - rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode="idle"}[1m]))
  * on(instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info
  * on(nodename) group_left(hpc_job) clamp(count by (nodename, hpc_job) (label_move(DCGM_FI_DEV_GPU_TEMP{hpc_job=~"$slurm_job"}, "Hostname", "nodename")), 1, 1)
) * 100

panels.title: CPU

targets.expr:
avg(
    (
        node_memory_MemTotal_bytes - 
        node_memory_MemFree_bytes  - 
        node_memory_Buffers_bytes - 
        node_memory_Cached_bytes
    ) / 
    node_memory_MemTotal_bytes{instance=~"$ip"}
    * on(instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info
    * on(nodename) group_left(hpc_job) clamp(count by (nodename, hpc_job) (label_move(DCGM_FI_DEV_GPU_TEMP{hpc_job=~"$slurm_job"}, "Hostname", "nodename")), 1, 1)
) * 100

panels.description:
GPU Shutdown Temp: 90 C
GPU Slowdown Temp: 87 C
GPU Max Operating Temp: 83 C
panels.title: GPU Avg. Temp

targets.expr:
with (
    filters = { job_id=~"$slurm_job"},
)
sum by (job_id,)(
  count by (job_id, job_name) (slurm_job_info{job_state="PENDING", filters}) * 1 or
  count by (job_id, job_name) (slurm_job_info{job_state="CONFIGURING",filters}) * 2 or
  count by (job_id, job_name) (slurm_job_info{job_state="RUNNING", filters}) * 3 or
  count by (job_id, job_name) (slurm_job_info{job_state="COMPLETING", filters}) * 4 or
  count by (job_id, job_name) (slurm_job_info{job_state="COMPLETED", filters}) * 5 or
  count by (job_id, job_name) (slurm_job_info{job_state="CANCELLED", filters}) * 6 or
  count by (job_id, job_name) (slurm_job_info{job_state="FAILED", filters}) * 7 or
  count by (job_id, job_name) (slurm_job_info{job_state="TIMEOUT", filters}) * 8 or
  count by (job_id, job_name) (slurm_job_info{job_state="PREEMPTED", filters}) * 9 or
  count by (job_id, job_name) (slurm_job_info{job_state="NODE_FAIL", filters}) * 10 or
  count by (job_id, job_name) (slurm_job_info{job_state="BOOT_FAIL", filters}) * 11 or
  count by (job_id, job_name) (slurm_job_info{job_state="DEADLINE", filters}) * 12 or
  count by (job_id, job_name) (slurm_job_info{job_state="OUT_OF_MEMORY", filters}) * 13 or
  count by (job_id, job_name) (slurm_job_info{job_state="REQUEUED", filters}) * 14 or
  count by (job_id, job_name) (slurm_job_info{job_state="RESIZING", filters}) * 15 or
  count by (job_id, job_name) (slurm_job_info{job_state="SUSPENDED", filters}) * 16 or
  count by (job_id, job_name) (slurm_job_info{job_state="STOPPED", filters}) * 17 or
  count by (job_id, job_name) (slurm_job_info{job_state="POWER_UP_NODE", filters}) * 18 or
  count by (job_id, job_name) (slurm_job_info{job_state="SIGNALING", filters}) * 19 or
  count by (job_id, job_name) (slurm_job_info{job_state="STAGE_OUT", filters}) * 20 or
  count by (job_id, job_name) (slurm_job_info{job_state="UPDATE_DB", filters}) * 21
)

panels.title: Cluster Overall Stats (for selected Jobs and Workers)

targets.expr:
max(
  (1 - rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode="idle", instance=~"$ip"}[$__rate_interval]))
  * on(instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info
  * on(nodename) group_left(hpc_job) clamp(count by (nodename, hpc_job) (label_move(DCGM_FI_DEV_GPU_TEMP{hpc_job=~"$slurm_job"}, "Hostname", "nodename")), 1, 1)
)

avg(
  (1 - rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode="idle", instance=~"$ip"}[$__rate_interval]))
  * on(instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info
  * on(nodename) group_left(hpc_job) clamp(count by (nodename, hpc_job) (label_move(DCGM_FI_DEV_GPU_TEMP{hpc_job=~"$slurm_job"}, "Hostname", "nodename")), 1, 1)
)

min(
  (1 - rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode="idle", instance=~"$ip"}[$__rate_interval]))
  * on(instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info
  * on(nodename) group_left(hpc_job) clamp(count by (nodename, hpc_job) (label_move(DCGM_FI_DEV_GPU_TEMP{hpc_job=~"$slurm_job"}, "Hostname", "nodename")), 1, 1)
)

panels.description: Sum of Tx and Rx for all selected Workers

targets.expr:
sum(
  rate(node_infiniband_port_data_transmitted_bytes_total{instance=~"$ip"}[$__interval])
  * on(instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info
  * on(nodename) group_left(hpc_job) clamp(count by (nodename, hpc_job) (label_move(DCGM_FI_DEV_GPU_TEMP{hpc_job=~"$slurm_job"}, "Hostname", "nodename")), 1, 1)
)

sum(
  rate(node_infiniband_port_data_received_bytes_total{instance=~"$ip"}[$__interval])
  * on(instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info
  * on(nodename) group_left(hpc_job) clamp(count by (nodename, hpc_job) (label_move(DCGM_FI_DEV_GPU_TEMP{hpc_job=~"$slurm_job"}, "Hostname", "nodename")), 1, 1)
)

panels.title: Infiniband Throughput

targets.expr:
max(
  (
    (
      node_memory_MemTotal_bytes - 
      node_memory_MemFree_bytes - 
      node_memory_Buffers_bytes - 
      node_memory_Cached_bytes
    )
    /
    node_memory_MemTotal_bytes{instance=~"$ip"}
  )
  * on(instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info
  * on(nodename) group_left(hpc_job) clamp(count by (nodename, hpc_job) (label_move(DCGM_FI_DEV_GPU_TEMP{hpc_job=~"$slurm_job"}, "Hostname", "nodename")), 1, 1)
)

avg(
  (
    (
      node_memory_MemTotal_bytes - 
      node_memory_MemFree_bytes - 
      node_memory_Buffers_bytes - 
      node_memory_Cached_bytes
    )
    /
    node_memory_MemTotal_bytes{instance=~"$ip"}
  )
  * on(instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info
  * on(nodename) group_left(hpc_job) clamp(count by (nodename, hpc_job) (label_move(DCGM_FI_DEV_GPU_TEMP{hpc_job=~"$slurm_job"}, "Hostname", "nodename")), 1, 1)
)

min(
  (
    (
      node_memory_MemTotal_bytes - 
      node_memory_MemFree_bytes - 
      node_memory_Buffers_bytes - 
      node_memory_Cached_bytes
    )
    /
    node_memory_MemTotal_bytes{instance=~"$ip"}
  )
  * on(instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info
  * on(nodename) group_left(hpc_job) clamp(count by (nodename, hpc_job) (label_move(DCGM_FI_DEV_GPU_TEMP{hpc_job=~"$slurm_job"}, "Hostname", "nodename")), 1, 1)
)

panels.title: GPU Avg Mem Usage per Worker
GPU Avg Mem Copy Utilization per Worker

list.description: Filter jobs that have at least this amount of workers
list.label: Min worker count
list.name: min_workers_per_job
